mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.cust_no custNo, t.acc_no accNo, t.accounting_no accountingNo, t.fund_type fundType, t.trade_type tradeType, t.income income, t.spending spending, t.balance balance, t.currency currency, t.lend_no lendNo, t.loan_no loanNo, t.trade_date tradeDate, t.trade_time tradeTime, t.summary summary, t.order_no orderNo, t.pay_channel payChannel, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime FROM t_gq_fss_accounting_funds_flow t
